index.hero_title: Effortless silhouettes for the city and beyond

index.story_subheading: We blend architectural lines with soft drape to create wardrobe foundations you'll return to season after season.
index.story_body_1: Every garment is sketched in our London studio and produced in limited runs to honor the artisans who bring them to life.
index.story_body_2: From regenerative textiles to low-impact dyes, sustainability guides every decision we make.

index.collection_essentials_copy: Layer-ready staples in breathable organic fibers designed to move with you.
index.collection_atelier_copy: Limited-edition gowns and bespoke suiting meticulously finished by hand.

index.lookbook_copy_weekend: Relaxed separates styled in tonal hues for effortless transitions.
index.lookbook_copy_evening: Bias-cut silk dresses with hand-beaded accents for after-dark elegance.
